1-Conver Decimal numbers to binary

5
answer: 00000101

31
answer: 00011111

112
answer: 01110000

255
answer: 11111111


2-convert Binary numbers to Decimal

11110001
answer: 241

11001010
answer: 202

11111111
answer: 255

00011100
answer: 28



3-Convert this text to binary

-Hello 
answer: 01001000 01100101 01101100 01101100 01101111

-Python
answer: 01010000 01111001 01110100 01101000 01101111 01101110

4-convert this binary to text

01011001 01101111 1110101
answer: 89 111 117 -> You

01000100 01101001 1100100
answer: 68 105 100 -> Did
 
01000111 01101111 1101111 1100100
answer: 71 111 111 100 -> Good

1001010 01101111 1100010
answer: 74 111 98 -> Job
